publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-384 Johann Lamont: Disability Sport—That the Parliament welcomes the decision of sportscotland to announce new funding of £250,750 for Scottish Disability Sport; expresses concern in relation to the level of funding in the context of preparations for the 2012 Paralympic Games and the five disability sports on Glasgow’s provisional 2014 Commonwealth Games programme, and seeks assurances from the Scottish Executive that it will consider how best to provide adequate funding for disability sport.
